articles.author: Rob Thubron
articles.title: Nvidia RTX 5090 graphics card power cable melts at both ends, bulge spotted at PSU side - TechSpot
articles.description: The latest case, reported by a Redditor called Roachard, involved an MSI RTX 5090 Gaming Trio OC. He bought the card from Best Buy about a month...
articles.content: Facepalm: Imagine getting ahead of the scalpers and securing a $3,000+ RTX 5090, only for the connectors on the card and cable to melt. There has been yet another one of these incidents reported, wit… [+2250 chars]
